index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services, authorizing the execution of an agreement with the United States of America, Department of Housing and Urban Development (herein called HUD), for a designated Special Purpose Grant to assist four Community Action Agencies in Seattle, increasing expenditure allowances in the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund and making the necessary appropriations therefor.
committee: Housing, Health, Human Services and Education
